com.ajaxjs.qr_code.fast

类 ReedSolomonGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ajaxjs.qr_code.fast.ReedSolomonGenerator

  • public final class ReedSolomonGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    给定数据码字计算 Reed-Solomon 错误纠正码字。 Computes Reed-Solomon error correction codewords for given data codewords.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      使用这个 memoizer 来获取这个类的实例。

      Returns the error correction codeword for the given data polynomial and this divisor polynomial.

      • MEMOIZER

        public static final Memoizer<java.lang.Integer,ReedSolomonGenerator> MEMOIZER

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRemainder

        public void getRemainder(byte[] data,
                         int dataOff,
                         int dataLen,
                         byte[] result)
        Returns the error correction codeword for the given data polynomial and this divisor polynomial.
        参数:
        data - The array containing the data polynomial coefficients
        dataOff - The starting offset in the data array for the coefficients of the data polynomial
        dataLen - The length of the data polynomial coefficients
        result - The array to store the calculated remainder, its length should be equal to the degree of the divisor polynomial
